1.text: Uh... hey. You work here, right? I came by last night to grab fries and... something was wrong.

2.text: The intercom. It laughed. I thought it was you guys messin’ with me, but... it said my name.

options.text: 1. How could it know your name?

3.text: No! I swear, I was stone-cold sober. The screen flashed ‘ORDER TAKEN’ before I said anything.

4.text: It said... ‘You’ve already eaten.’ Then the speaker hissed, like... breathing. I just drove off.

5.text: Yeah... maybe. Finals week’s gettin’ to me. I barely sleep. Maybe I just... heard myself.

6.text: Tried. Police laughed. Said maybe I mixed up voices. But it wasn’t a voice—it was a *mouth.*

7.text: Just... don’t lean too close to the speaker. I think it listens harder when you breathe in.
